description_html:
Curve Sofa: Upholstered sofa with tight back and loose non-reversible bench cushion on a plinth base. Comes standard with welt along the back, down the front arms, on the seat cushion, and at the seam details on the inside back. Available in all standard and premium maple finishes, a satin smoke stainless steel finish, or a brushed gold stainless steel finish

ALCHEMY – the philosophy and practice of purifying, maturing and perfecting elements – is the inspiration behind Donghia’s 2017 Furniture and Lighting Collection.
For more than 40 years, Donghia has been synonymous with visionary American design and exquisite craftsmanship. Designed in Manhattan and made from the world’s finest materials, the 2017 Alchemy collection advances Donghia’s legacy of urban, contemporary design, legendary comfort, grounded in old-world artistry.
Wood, metal and glass have been worked upon by hand, tradition and time. Imagination becomes reality and beauty takes functional shape as wood suggests movement, metal energizes line, glass appears liquid.
The sensuous lines of the Curve Sofa—constructed by hand of maple, steel, and down, wrapped by an antique satin stainless steel belt, welcomes you to sit and cradles when you do.
Through the power of ALCHEMY, the 2017 Donghia Furniture and Lighting collection seamlessly integrates materials and transforms it into artwork. We invite you to experience The Art of Donghia with the 2017 ALCHEMY Collection.
